TopicTitle: Why would I still be in 1.2? (Steam)

Articles.Content: I recently upgraded my computer and KSP was downloaded again via Steam. I was expecting to play 1.3 but the version number at the bottom of my screen says it's version 1.2.

Hello. I'm about 99.9% sure 1.3 hasn't been released yet. 1.2 just got released a few weeks back.

Most likely when you upgraded your computer your KSP version might have needed a little "checking" by steam.

I wish 1.3 was out already.

 

EDIT: Wow, that's a lot of tabs you've got open there.

Edited October 16, 2016 by Ultimate Steve

i'll toss in the other 0.01 percent.

You have the current version. 1.2 came out like a week ago.

3 minutes ago, Ultimate Steve said:

Hello. I'm about 99.9% sure 1.3 hasn't been released yet. 1.2 just got released a few weeks back.

Most likely when you upgraded your computer your KSP version might have needed a little "checking" by steam.

I wish 1.3 was out already.

 

EDIT: Wow, that's a lot of tabs you've got open there.

Hey, you're right, I got 1.1.2 confused with 1,2. It's been a little while since I played and I was expecting 1.1.3 still!

Yeah, that's not nearly as many tabs as I usually end up with. It's all stuff I want to come back to at some point; pretty messy, I know. I do try to close the stuff I know I'm done with.
